#include <stdio.h>
#define max 500007

unsigned long a[max];
bool exceeded[max];
unsigned long mod = 10000;

int main(){

    for (int i = 1; i < max; i++) a[i] = 1;

    for (int i = 2; i < max;i++){
        for (int j = i*2;j<max;j+=i){
            a[j] *= i;
            if (a[j] >= mod){
                exceeded[j] = true;
                a[j] %= mod;
            }
        }
    }
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(exceeded[n])
        {
            printf("%04lu\n",a[n]);
        }
        else {
            printf("%lu\n",a[n]);
        }
    }
}
